title: 199. Andy & DJ CTI: Covid-19 Tracking Microchip, White House Doomsday Message & Re-Enacting The Holocaust
itunes:title: 199. Andy & DJ CTI: Covid-19 Tracking Microchip, White House Doomsday Message & Re-Enacting The Holocaust
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss a Swedish start-up tech company that has developed a microchip that allows users to download their Covid-19 passport status, the White House's doomsday winter message of 'severe illness and death' for the unvaccinated, and the 3rd grade teacher that instructed students to re-enact the Holocaust.
